# awx Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    awx = {
      source  = "github.com/josh-silvas/awx"
      version = "0.1"
    }
  }
}

provider "awx" {
  hostname = "https://awx.example.com"
  username = "admin"
  password = "password"
  token    = "token"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `hostname` (String)
- `insecure` (Boolean) Disable SSL verification of API calls
- `password` (String, Sensitive)
- `token` (String, Sensitive)
- `username` (String)
